data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pessacq, Pablo, Rivera-Pomar, Rolando (2019): A new Andiperla Aubert (Plecoptera, Gripopterygidae) species from the Perito Moreno Glacier, Argentina. Zootaxa 4664 (2): 251-260, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4664.2.7|11 occurrences
